magnet_strength.description: Relative strength of the magnet. Higher values indicate stronger magnetic fields.

distance_from_object.description: Distance between the magnet and the object being tested.

material_type.description: Type of material placed near the magnet.

pole_orientation.description: Orientation of magnetic poles relative to each other.

magnetic_field_intensity.description: Initial magnetic field intensity of the magnet.

shape_of_magnet.description: Physical shape of the magnet, influencing field distribution.

surface_contact.description: Whether the magnet is in direct contact with the object.

number_of_magnets.description: Number of magnets used together in the experiment.

surrounding_medium.description: Medium surrounding the magnet and object, affecting field propagation.
